version_description:
Based on your feedback, Hurdlr has redesigned the app to make everything faster to save you even more time and money.

Key Highlights:
-Swiping and gestures added for speed and time savings
-Track your quarterly and annual Tax payments
-We eliminated the need to sync your cloud account
-We reduced battery consumption
-We made it load up a lot quicker

Premium Features Added:
-Speed Tag multiple expenses together
-Create Rules for auto-tagging of Expenses
-Set Up Work hours for auto-tagging of Mileage
-For many credit cards and banks, you can get more historical data

Key Highlights:
-Mileage tracker accuracy improvements
-Rare lagging/freezing bugs resolved
-Smaller data footprint
-Assorted bug fixes

Premium Features:
-Speed Tag multiple expenses together
-Create Rules for auto-tagging of Expenses
-Set Up Work hours for auto-tagging of Mileage
-For many credit cards and banks, you can get more historical data

Key Highlights:
-Mileage tracker improvements
-Expanded date options on reports
-Better handling of receipts on recurring expenses
-Rare loading bugs resolved
-Fixes for users having trouble upgrading to Hurdlr Premium
-Ability to keep different mileage settings on each of your devices

Key Highlights:
-Mileage Speed Tagging feature added to Hurdlr Premium
-Report enhancements for 2017 tax reporting
-More information on Mileage rows
-Undo Tagging feature added to Hurdlr Premium
-Better handling of receipts on recurring expenses

Key Highlights:
-Mileage Speed Tagging feature added to Hurdlr Premium
-Undo Tagging feature added to Hurdlr Premium
-Assorted bug fixes

Key Highlights:
-Mileage tracker improvements
-Tax dashboard enhancements
-Made it easier to view 2017 totals
-Improved iPhone X design

Key Highlights:
-Create your own Income Rules
-File taxes with just a few taps
-Smarter Expense Categorization
-Tax dashboard enhancements

Key Highlights:
-Performance enhancements
-Better handling for users tagging on multiple devices
-File taxes with just a few taps
-Smarter Income Categorization
-Assorted bug fixes are reported by users

Key Highlights:
-File taxes with just a few taps
-Addition of COGS expense categories
-Meals & Entertainment updates for 2018 tax code
-Assorted bug fixes are reported by users

Key Highlights:
-Enhancements to Income Rules
-Addition of COGS expense categories
-Meals & Entertainment updates for 2018 tax code
-Assorted bug fixes are reported by users

For All Users:
-Try Hurdlr Premium for 7 days FREE
-Added ability to track Time & Tasks
-Allow users to specify their own W-2 Withholdings, for more accurate tax estimates
-On-going performance improvements
-Assorted bug fixes reported by users

For Real Estate Agents:
-Listing-related improvements

For Square Sellers:
-Smarter integration with your Square account

For Uber Partners and Drivers:
-Smarter integration with your Uber Partner account

• Leverage Siri to turn auto-mileage tracking on and off
• Interactive notifications allow quick tagging of new expenses and drives
• AI-based expense categorization automation and smart rule suggestions that require less decision making and capture more tax savings
• Smart integrations with Stripe, Shopify, Upwork, Xero and Square
• Enhanced 2018 reporting
• Faster performance + minor bug fixes

• Machine Learning saves you money and time: Hurdlr helps you quickly find expenses that you can deduct for your specific business, based on CPA-recommended behavior and other users’ behavior for your type of business

• Artificial Intelligence learns your driving and spending behavior, and makes personalized suggestions that save you even more time and money.

• Reporting: view and export beautiful financial reports, with pro filters by business and by client.

• Tax Enhancements: integrated tax filing, 2020 income tax rates, home office deduction, and Schedule C reporting that will delight your accountant

• Redesigned iPad UI

• Support for the latest OS: privacy and permissions optimized

• Tax Enhancements: updates to reflect the Emergency Declaration for COVID-19

• Machine Learning saves you money and time: Hurdlr helps you quickly find expenses that you can deduct for your specific business, based on CPA-recommended behavior and other users’ behavior for your type of business

• Artificial Intelligence learns your driving and spending behavior, and makes personalized suggestions that save you even more time and money.

• Reporting: view and export beautiful financial reports, with pro filters by business and by client.

• Ability to merge multiple trips into one trip

• Dark mode optimization

• Ability to Sign in with Apple

• Machine Learning saves you money and time: Hurdlr helps you quickly find expenses that you can deduct for your specific business, based on CPA-recommended behavior and other users’ behavior for your type of business

• Artificial Intelligence learns your driving and spending behavior, and makes personalized suggestions that save you even more time and money.

• Reporting: view and export beautiful financial reports, with pro filters by business and by client.

• Mileage: Favorite Locations such as home, office, client sites, etc. can be saved and automatically classified

ML: Learning algorithms enhancements specifically for Rental Owners & Hosts

Data Visualizations: Beautiful data visualizations added for profitability, expenses, and mileage

Minor bug fixes

Widget: Control the mileage tracker via the widget (new for iOS 14!)

Minor performance improvements
